ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Wind velocity obtained by MF radar at Tromsoe, Norway
ResourceHeader.Description: Wind velocity between 70 and 100 km from November 1998 to July 2014 obtained by the medium frequency (MF) radar at Tromsoe. For details of the instruments, please look at Hall (2001). The full reference is Hall, C. M. (2001), The Ramfjordmoen MF radar (69N, 19E): application development 1990-2000, J. Atmos. Sol. Terr. Phys., 63, 171-179.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The data are available only for scientific research use. The MF radar has been operated under collabrations between ISEE, Nagoya University, TGO, University of Tromsoe, and ISAS University of Saskatchewan. Please contact the Principal Investigator (Satonori NOZAWA, nozawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) for the details.

AccessURL.Name: Website of the Tromsoe MF radar, ISEE, Nagoya University
AccessURL.Description: Mesospheric wind data obtained by the MF radar at Tromsoe, Norway.
